about.txt: Hey guys, it’s me Hector. I love playing basketball, and I’m pretty good at it too, if I do say so myself!
As the oldest member of The Electric Company. I try to keep the gang and my sister out of trouble.
My special power is photo recall. I can make a picture in the air of anything I see.
Yeah, I sing, I dance, I rap… and my hair is always looking fresh!
Now that I’m working at the Electric Diner, if the guys ever need my help, they know where to find me!
The Electric Company crew is pretty tight. We make a great problem solving team!
I have a special “aural recall” power. That means I can record and play back anything I hear!
I might be younger and smaller than my bro, Hector, but sometimes I am exactly who he needs.
We don’t always see eye to eye (he’s a lot taller than me!) but Hector and I have a lot of fun together.
I’m a problem solver. Luckily, my friends are, too, so we can always beat the pranksters at their own game.
I like to sing and dance, and I can rap too! Shock, gimme a beat!
Marcus is new to the Company, so I look out for him. I always have his back.

printout.id: Manny's B.L.T.: hard and soft c

about.txt: I can invent any gadget imaginable! My favorite inventions are the ones that mess with the Electric Company!
Introducing…Count Vacula! He is just one of my many great inventions!
My Little Mean Robot and I do everything together. We’re best friends and partners in playing pranks!
Here I am with Little Mean Robot at the neighborhood dance-off. I programmed him with some sweet moves.
Get outta my way! I am the Mighty Bright Knight!
I’m a very talented actor. I’m so talented that The Electric Company begged me to star in their movie.

printout.id: Rebus Roundup: short i and ick

about.txt: I, Danny Rebus, have the power to create rebus puzzles. This comes in handy when pulling pranks!
Yes. I admit it. I can be sensitive. Here is one time that I really bugged out.
The Electric Company never invites me to do anything. Who needs them? I've got my old pal Manny!
When Hector does include me I suppose we get along well.
Sure I’m a prankster, but I am also a dog lover. I dream of being The Puppy Hero!
I love to sing and dance! When I do I just feel so… Danny.

printout.id: Words Across: Two sounds of s
Words Across: hard and soft c

about.txt: I was pretty young when I discovered I can make wordballs. Now I compete in The Wordball Games!
My special power is image creation. I can draw any picture I want in the air!
I can be a little competitive… but I just love playing sports and having fun.
I also love making music. Any chance I get, I break out my guitar.
The Electric Diner has delicious cheese omelets. Fortunately, they taste better than they smell!
Sure we all have special skills, but only I broke the record for most clothing worn at once!
Hello, Annie Scrambler here! Thanks for checking out my profile. I know you’re going to love it.
When I stomp my feet, I can scramble words. This can be very useful when trying to confuse The Electric Company.
Uncle Sigmund is my favorite uncle! I’d do anything to help him out. Of course, I’m also his favorite niece.
He is teaching me how to hypnotize. One day I’ll be able to make The Electric Company do anything I tell them to.
Here I am with my Aunt Sandy. She’s not only the best aunt a girl could have, but also the best dresser I know!
At the Spooky Summer Soiree, I taught Gilda Flip all I know about putting together a great costume!
I’m Francine Carruthers. My profile is the best profile because, well, everything I do is perfect.
I use my wordball power responsibly and only when necessary – like when it will help me to win.
I’m a fantastic journalist. I’m very fair, especially when it comes to taking down The Electric Company
This is my mother and me. She thinks I am so wonderful she even wanted to name a hotel in my honor.
Here I am with my science fair project: The Perfect Brain. Of course I used my perfect brain as the model.
Gilda looks up to me. Who wouldn’t? I’m teaching her all I know about being a prankster. She has a lot to learn.
I am an unscrambling machine! With my word decoding skill, I can tackle anything the Pranksters try.
I love being creative with my friends. Here I am directing a movie we made together!
I like to sing and act. Though sometimes I have to overcome stage fright.
Science is my favorite subject, and Dax is my favorite lab partner!
If you see me dancing, watch out! Seriously. I can be all over the place!
The more I practice though, the better I get. At the neighborhood dance-off Shock and I won!
I went to Space Camp recently. It was awesome!! I highly recommend it.
Hi, I’m Paul. People tell me I’m a pretty nice guy, but I’m a gorilla. So I guess I’m a pretty nice gorilla.
I've got a lot going on, but I always make time to help out The Electric Company whenever they need me.
When making movies, the Electric Company knows who to call when they need a camera guy!
I love sports. Ping pong is one of my favorite games. I have an outstanding backhand.
I can break it down real nice. By that I mean I am quite the dancer.
There is nothing I enjoy more than doing a crossword puzzle on a quiet park bench.

printout.id: Add A Word: cr and br

about.txt: Hi! I just got the power and was sworn in as an official member of The Electric Company!
I also have a special number power. Any math problem you have, I’m on it!
I’m really excited to be part of the Company! Man, I can’t wait for all the adventures we’re going to have.
Here I am with the guys at the diner. We’re coming up with a plan to beat the Pranksters at their own game.
Oh yeah!!! I helped score the winning point for The Electric Company during the Wordball Games!

printout.id: Space Maze: short a and short o

about.txt: I’m a prankster-in-training. I am trying to learn everything I can about being a prankster from Francine.
Francine is the smartest prankster in the neighborhood and the only one who can make wordballs.
I love coming up with ideas. I like to write them down in lists and keep them in a notebook.
Sometimes I help out other pranksters. Here is Annie and me at the Spooky Summer Soiree costume contest.
I may not have a special power yet, but I’m pretty great at braking records. I once broke six records in one day.
Hey, I'm Shock! I work in the Electric Diner and give The Electric Company a hand whenever they need me.
Need a nice beat to rap to? I’m your guy! I can teach you how to beatbox too. Just remember – boots and cuts!
I’ve got some pretty talented friends. I like to beatbox while my buddy Mario takes the lead rapping.
I love hanging out with The Electric Company. There is always something crazy going on!
What can I say? I guess I’m a great guy…
This is me beatboxing with the one of the people I admire most: Doug E. Fresh!
